content: jellycat hat and scarf note this pattern is fit for a small sized jellycat bunny the hat has holes so that the bunny s ears can go through please only use this pattern for personal use do not sell any finished products materials abbreviations gauge size 4 dpns k knit 23 sts x 28 row 4 x 4 inches worsted weight yarn p purl tapestry needle k2tog knit 2 together instructions hat cast on 38 sts k1 p1 repeat to the end of the round knit in the rib stich for 5 rounds total knit 1 round k7 cast off 5 k14 cast off 5 k7 k7 cast on 5 k14 cast on 5 k7 knit 3 rounds k2tog k1 around until there are 8 sts left k2tog 4 times cut yarn and weave through the 4 sts tie off add pom-pom if desired weave in ends scarf cast on 4 sts knit in stockinette stich until the scarf reaches 12 5 inches or desired length cast off and cut yarn weave in ends
